consumables.name: Viewer's Choice Grenade
consumables.description: A chaotic grenade with random effects. Could heal you, could hurt enemies, could do something weird!

consumables.name: Liquid Courage
consumables.description: Grants 3 seconds of complete invulnerability. You can still attack but take no damage.

consumables.name: Recall Beacon
consumables.description: Teleport back to the center of the arena. Useful for escaping dangerous situations.

consumables.name: Monster Musk
consumables.description: Attracts all enemies toward you for 10 seconds. Dangerous but great for grouping enemies!

consumables.name: Mystery Meat
consumables.description: Questionable meat from an unknown creature. Eat at your own risk.

materials.name: Gold Coins
materials.description: Shiny gold coins. The currency of adventurers.

materials.name: Goblin Tooth
materials.description: A jagged tooth from a goblin. Crafting material.

materials.name: Rat Tail
materials.description: A disgusting tail from a dungeon rat. Surprisingly valuable to alchemists.

materials.name: Broken Arrow
materials.description: A snapped arrow shaft. The fletching is still usable.

materials.name: Enchanted Dust
materials.description: Sparkling magical residue. Used in enchanting and alchemy.

materials.name: Gemstone
materials.description: A beautiful gemstone of unknown origin. Worth a fair bit of gold.

materials.name: Dragon Scale
materials.description: A single scale from a powerful dragon. Extremely rare and valuable.

questItems.name: Ancient Relic
questItems.description: A mysterious artifact from a forgotten age. Scholars would pay handsomely for this.

goblin_ear.name: Goblin Ear
goblin_ear.description: A pointed ear from a goblin. Sought by alchemists.

shaman_staff_fragment.name: Shaman Staff Fragment
shaman_staff_fragment.description: A piece of enchanted wood from a shaman's staff.

goblin_throwing_knife.name: Goblin Throwing Knife
goblin_throwing_knife.description: A crude but sharp throwing knife used by goblin throwers.

warlord_banner.name: Warlord Banner
warlord_banner.description: A tattered piece of a warlord's battle banner.

slime_core.name: Slime Core
slime_core.description: The gelatinous core of a slime. Surprisingly valuable.

bone_fragment.name: Bone Fragment
bone_fragment.description: A piece of bleached bone from an animated skeleton.

wolf_fang.name: Wolf Fang
wolf_fang.description: A sharp fang from a dungeon wolf.

bat_wing.name: Bat Wing
bat_wing.description: A leathery wing from a cave bat.

evil_eye_lens.name: Evil Eye Lens
evil_eye_lens.description: The crystalline lens from an evil eye. Still faintly glowing.

mushroom_cap.name: Mushroom Cap
mushroom_cap.description: A colorful cap from a hostile mushroom creature.

spider_silk.name: Spider Silk
spider_silk.description: Strong silk harvested from a giant spider.

lizard_scale.name: Lizard Scale
lizard_scale.description: A tough scale from a dungeon lizard.

badlama_wool.name: Badlama Wool
badlama_wool.description: Soft wool from the aggressive badlama.

rat_whisker.name: Rat Whisker
rat_whisker.description: A long whisker from a dungeon rat.

crawler_mandible.name: Crawler Mandible
crawler_mandible.description: A razor-sharp mandible from a crawler killer.

shadow_essence.name: Shadow Essence
shadow_essence.description: Wispy essence from a shadow stalker.

stitched_flesh.name: Stitched Flesh
stitched_flesh.description: Preserved flesh from a flesh golem.

plague_vial.name: Plague Vial
plague_vial.description: A sealed vial of plague from a plague bearer.

enchanted_plate.name: Enchanted Plate
enchanted_plate.description: A piece of magically animated armor.

drone_lens.name: Drone Lens
drone_lens.description: A camera lens from a destroyed drone.

shock_capacitor.name: Shock Capacitor
shock_capacitor.description: An electrical capacitor from a shock drone.

ad_crystal.name: Ad Crystal
ad_crystal.description: A crystal that projects advertisements. Annoying.

clockwork_gear.name: Clockwork Gear
clockwork_gear.description: A precision gear from a clockwork spider.

lava_core.name: Lava Core
lava_core.description: A molten core from a lava elemental. Handle with care.

frozen_essence.name: Frozen Essence
frozen_essence.description: Frozen energy from an ice wraith.

cube_residue.name: Cube Residue
cube_residue.description: Acidic residue from a gelatinous cube.

void_fragment.name: Void Fragment
void_fragment.description: A fragment of the void. Reality warps around it.

mimic_tongue.name: Mimic Tongue
mimic_tongue.description: The sticky tongue of a mimic. Disturbing.

royal_slime_essence.name: Royal Slime Essence
royal_slime_essence.description: Concentrated essence from a Slime King. Very rare.

ancient_bone.name: Ancient Bone
ancient_bone.description: An ancient bone imbued with dark magic.

dragon_heart.name: Dragon Heart
dragon_heart.description: The still-warm heart of a dragon. Legendary.

queen_venom_sac.name: Queen Venom Sac
queen_venom_sac.description: A venom sac from a Spider Queen. Extremely poisonous.

elder_spore.name: Elder Spore
elder_spore.description: A potent spore from the Sporeling Elder.

butcher_cleaver_shard.name: Butcher Cleaver Shard
butcher_cleaver_shard.description: A shard from The Butcher's infamous cleaver.

shadow_crystal.name: Shadow Crystal
shadow_crystal.description: A dark crystal from Mordecai's Shadow.
